Package player.cards

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
player.cards.Deck
public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
Deck class represents a full deck of cards. As a full deck of cards, it has a list of cards.
Author:
Miguel Carvalho, Filipe Ferraz, Joao Baptista

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<Card> deck  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Deck()
    Constructor to initialize deck object with all the 52 cards (Simulation Mode).
    Deck​(java.util.List<Card> d)
    Constructor to initialize deck object from a card-file (Debug Mode).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addCard​(Card c)
    This method adds a card to the end of the deck.
    int getSize()
    This methods returns the size of the deck.
    Card popCard()
    This method removes a card from the beginning of the deck and returns it.
    void printCards​(int n)
    This method prints n number of cards from the deck or none if the deck does not have n number of cards.
    void shuffle()
    This method shuffles the deck.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck​(java.util.List<Card> d)
      Constructor to initialize deck object from a card-file (Debug Mode).
      Parameters:
      d - List of cards to constitute the deck.

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Constructor to initialize deck object with all the 52 cards (Simulation Mode).

  • Method Details

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      This method shuffles the deck.

    • printCards

      public void printCards​(int n)
      This method prints n number of cards from the deck or none if the deck does not have n number of cards.
      Parameters:
      n - Number of cards to be printed.

    • addCard

      public void addCard​(Card c)
      This method adds a card to the end of the deck.
      Parameters:
      c - Card that is added to the deck.

    • popCard

      public Card popCard()
      This method removes a card from the beginning of the deck and returns it.
      Returns:
      Card that is being removed from the deck.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      This methods returns the size of the deck.
      Returns:
      Size of deck.
